history.proof: intros m n. intros H. qauto use: rel_prime_mult, Znumtheory.rel_prime_sym.

original: intros m n. intros H. unfold rel_prime in H. unfold rel_prime. intros x H1. specialize (H x H1). destruct (Z.eq_decidable x 1) as [Eq1 | NEq1]. + subst. rewrite Z.mul_1_r. apply Zis_gcd_1_r. + destruct (Z.eq_decidable x (-1)) as [Eq2 | NEq2]. * subst. rewrite Z.mul_1_r. apply Zis_gcd_m1_r. * apply relp_neq in H1; auto. apply H in H1; auto. apply relp_neq in H1; auto.
